column4: hey, does anyone know of the compiz effect where the menus close with a shower of sparkles?
you wouldn't know which one in particular?
you can get it with explode or burn I think
need to set the colours to random
whod you set the colors to random?
under FIRE ... I think it's that one.. of the top of my head that is
I would advice you to play around with the settings a little, something nice is bound to come up :)
yep, that's the one I told you..
I checked for you, and it's "burn"
oh, cool, i just worked it out... randoom colors under fire
for more questions related to compiz, you might find #compiz a suitable channel...
